Reviews.Title: VideoSecu 16 Pieces Power Plug Pigtail Cables 3 Feet 2.1mm DC Male Female...
Reviews.Author: clong68
Reviews.Content: These work just like they are suposed to work, a great product that is well worth the money, I love it.

Reviews.Title: Good Service
Reviews.Author: JBrown
Reviews.Content: Great Quality, easy to solder to my low voltage appliances.  These are center-positive barrel connectors, and that's what I needed.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for extending low voltage connections.
Reviews.Author: Wayne
Reviews.Content: I bought it to extend low voltage connections when the wires were to short.  It makes the connections more professional looking and  more electrically correct.  Also when replacing parts it is simply a matter of unplugging & removing the bad part then replacing with a new one.

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu 16 Pieces Power Plug Pigtail Cables 3 Feet 2.1mm DC Male
Reviews.Author: Maurice H. Nelson
Reviews.Content: Item used for surveillance system and it works like it was made to do, would recommend this product to anyone needing added hardware to their system.

ProductInfo.Features:
Power pigtail cables allows easy connection between surveillance camera and power supply
Outside diameter: 5.5mm, Inside diameter: 2.1mm
Center positive 2.1mm DC plug
Length: 3 feet. Easy to install
Package included: 8 Male Power Pigtails and 8 Female Power Pigtails
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 16 Pieces Power Plug Pigtail Cables 3 Feet 2.1mm DC Male Female Cords Wires for CCTV DVR Security camera Power Supply Box A94
